generated_question: Two circles intersect at points A and C. The left circle is centered at O₁ and passes through vertices A, B, and C of an equilateral triangle ABC with side length 9. The right circle is centered at O₂ and is a translation of the left circle to the right, also passing through A and C. The arc BC lies on the left circle (center O₁). Find the length of arc BC.
